name: Arena of RNG
description: hello brave adventurer, we thank you for applying to our monster slaying program. if you check the shed to your right you will see your magical die (trademarked do not steal), as well as possible spells to buy in the store. drag the spells you wish to put on your die to the desired face, and when you are ready enter the arena of rng in front of you. in the arena of rng you will fight monsters in turn-based combat, in each turn you can either move by clicking on one of the move buttons, or attack by rolling your die, you can also view your die by hovering over it. for each monster, you kill you will be awarded coins which you can use to upgrade your die. you win if you manage to defeat the eye (3rd enemy), you lose if you don't but still keep your gold.
